meaningMnemonic: If you eat both the <radical>moon</radical> and the <radical>sun</radical> with a <radical>spoon</radical> you'll get <kanji>fat</kanji>. Maybe if you only ate one you could get away with it, but you wanted both and now you're pretty fat.
readingMnemonic: Once you're nice and <kanji>fat</kanji>, you look in the mirror to admire your new girth. But that's not you... it's a <reading>shee</reading>p (し)!
